    About Lori Gabriel


    As a real estate veteran and experienced broker since 1993, I have worked hard over the past 26 years to build my brand and business. Having extensive knowledge and experience in the real estate market both in Connecticut and Massachusetts, I have had the privilege of helping hundreds of my clients achieve their house visions throughout the years. Helping clients has become second nature to me over the course of my lifetime and I truly enjoy working in the real estate industry. As a certified real estate Broker, I have received dozens of specialty achievement awards and certifications including, ABR (Accredited Buyer Representative) and CRS (Certified Residential Specialist), for my dedication to real estate. As a member of the Cartus Relocation Company, I have the opportunity to assist in relocating families from coast to coast, USAA Military Families and Navy Federal Credit Union families too. Specializing in single family residences, I also work closely with Builders and Developers to sell new construction homes and developments, and have had the pleasure of building many long life relationships along the way. When you are considering buying or selling, I hope youâll consider me, to help guide you through the process, I promise to get you to where you want to be!

    Lori Gabriel
